Brightcove のドキュメント

Get in front of your audiences wherever they are with one easy interface. With Brightcove Social you can quickly publish your videos to Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube from a single location, edit your videos right in the platform, and consolidate your analytics to see your true ROI in one comprehensive dashboard.



Video Cloud Studio

Manage your video publishing workflow across desktop, tablet and mobile devices.

Brightcove Gallery

Create engaging video experiences without the need for any technical knowledge or coding.

Brightcove Live

Broadcast live events to both desktop and mobile devices.

Brightcove SSAI

Dynamically stitch targeted ads into your content deliver both as a continuous stream.

Integrations/Connectors

Manage your video publishing workflow and harness the power of video with popular 3rd party platforms.

General Information

This site contains general information about Video Cloud.

Beacon Studio

Create a single media streaming experience to be used across multiple OTT platforms and devices.

Beacon Classic

Create a single media streaming experience to be used across multiple OTT platforms and devices.

Corp TV

CorpTV gives Enterprises a streaming service to reach their audience.

Brightcove Player

Use CSS and JavaScript to create customized video experiences with the Brightcove Player.

Platform APIs

The platform APIs allow you access almost every aspect of the Video Cloud platform programmatically.

Device SDKs

Use the Brightcove Native SDKs for native app integration with Android, iOS, iPadOS, and tvOS.

Zencoder

A fast and reliable transcoding service for video and audio files, producing outputs for the web and devices, and can be integrated with your CMS and other applications.

Player Series

Unleash the Power of the Player.
